name: Sale Rush
description:
You are a guy that shopping in a free supermarket.

You are trying to get the most valuable items in the short amount of time,

But other people that shoping there too are trampling you and makes you drop items.

your goal is to get the most valuable items in the short amount of time.

get the items by going to the aisles and press E.

To get the money from the items go to the cashier and press E.

Yair Mizrachi - Coding: https://yair-mizrachi.itch.io/

José Granado - Graphics: https://lumagalaxy.itch.io/

Capacraft - Music:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCVPiuV-NhGqW9nMCJ4vdHg

Love the game? Leave a comment and say your best score
